text: So I’m trying to setup a pluto static HTML export github action for Yao.jl tutorial, but I need to insert a nav bar on the top of the pluto HTML. but I’m not sure where Pluto emits the HTML? anyone can guide me to the related lines of code in Pluto so I can make a PR to support this?
